attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In this age of identity theft, those of us registering a petition are forced to enter personal data into an insecure web site.

Is this a deliberate attempt to put us off ???

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
